Entities.M07_Template.HandlerPackage

Class TemplateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.M07_Template.HandlerPackage.TemplateHandler

  • public class TemplateHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    TemplateHanlder class used for the management of information search in the database with respect to templates.

      constructor without receiving parameters that instantiates the sql attribute of the ParameterHandler class.
